text: pachi jo teni'one (triji vara) talaka api de to have tena mate halala nathi, jyam sudhi ke te stri tena sivaya bija sathe lagna na kare, pachi jo te pana talaka api de to phari te bannene sathe rahevamam ko'i guno nathi, sarata e che ke te'o jani le ke allaha ni nakki karela sima'one jalavi rakhase, a allaha ta'alani hado che, jene te (allaha) janavavala mate bayana kare che
